tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very calm and nice place. Very prompt and not had to wait for a long ti.e outside in the waiting area. When comes to the treatment part, i have been to so many dentist as of now and this is the first time i came out of the clinic without fear. Usually i postpone my dental visits becausw of the fear i have for the treatment but after going to Venu's Dental clinic that fear is gone and i will be happy to go for my next appointment on time without any fear. Doctor explained me the problem and she didn't scare me. Recommend anyone to go to this clinic for your dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife R Venkata Laxmi suffering with severe teeth pain.  Before going to Venu dental clinic I took her to nearest dental clinic at Gayatri hills. The doctor examined and said she needs root canal treatment and caps to be fixed. I agree for that and paid money in advance. They called continuesly for one week for treatment, they completed treatment but day by day pain is increasing. She very much distrubed physically and mentally with her treatment. Immediately I went to Venu dental hospital at Madhapur. Dr Venugopal sir examined her and given treatment. Within one week it was cured and she is happy. I am very much happy with his treatment and highly satisfied. Also very happy with his staff cooperation and good follow up. I am happily recomend to my friends, relatives and my colleagues to Venu dental hospital.

review: Received me with a smile and listen to the problem completely before checking my teeth. After diagnosis, he explained the structure of the teeth and the deviation which I have they worked hard till the smile transferred onto my face.
